mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BCOUPON (ESTID, COUPONID, DISCOUNT, PERIOD, MINIMUMPRICE, MAXISSUENUM) VALUES (#{estid}, #{couponid}, #{discount}, #{period}, #{minimumprice}, #{maxissuenum})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(COUPONID) FROM BCOUPON WHERE COUPONID = #{couponid}
